profile_positions.description:
•	Lead 5G Mobile Networks massive integration projects.
•	Follow the strategy of the department to reach the RAN deployment goals.
•	Ensure the available resources to achieve the implementation plans.
•	Ensure the knowledge spread and plan training actions.
•	Monitoring the ongoing project activities within the project management plan.
•	Coaching and developing team members’ competences.
•	Gather, and analyze information to identify issues, and provide solutions.
•	Spread the vision and values within the team.
•	Adapt internal ways of working to a fast-changing environment.
•	Coordinating with different parties to schedule the diverse activities.
profile_positions.title: Telecom Implementation Team Leader (for Odido)

profile_positions.description:
• Monitoring the ongoing project activities against the project management plan and the project performance baseline.
• Monitor contractors performance and proactively manage project planning.
• Coordination between departments and contractors to perform work.
• Set up and improving processes.
profile_positions.title: Telecom Implementation Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
• Leading SRAN 5G, 4G, 3G & 2G integration projects.
• Creating, updating and maintaining the team Tools (VBA, SQL)
• Technical enabler on new projects (Active Antenna, Massive MIMO, etc)

As a part of the team, we are responsible for the Integration of T-Mobile's RAN and Transport Network, remotely supporting the following tasks:

• Deploying the PTN MPLS network.
• Improving the existing SDH and DWDM networks.
• Renewing Legacy Microwaves into Ethernet links.
• Cabinet expansions, software upgrades, hardware and capacity increase.
• RNO requirements: Frequency plans, Refarming, Neighbouring, massive parameters changes.
• New features implementation.
profile_positions.title: RAN Integration Lead Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Personal projects:
• Leading SRAN LTE 900, 1800 & 2100 integration projects.
• Leading SRAN UMTS 900 & 2100 integration projects.
• Leading SRAN GSM 1800 integration project.

As a part of the team, we are responsible for the Integration of T-Mobile's RAN and Transport Network, remotely supporting the following tasks:
• Deploying the PTN MPLS network.
• Improving the existing SDH and DWDM networks.
• Renewing Legacy Microwaves into Ethernet links.
• Cabinet expansions, software upgrades, hardware and capacity increase.
• RNO requirements: Frequency plans, Refarming, Neighbouring, massive parameters changes.
• New features implementation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Integration Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Achievements:
• Reduced rate of overtimes due to RIC to <1% 
• Reduced rate of overtimes due to Others to <8%
• Increased number of weekly swaps up to 400%
• Successfully implemented Weekly, daily and every 2 hours reporting to Managers, Customers and Subcos.

Tasks:
My technical responsibilities & qualifications were similar to my actual position, plus the following ones related to the team leader role:
• Program & Line Manager Reporting.
• Planning RIC team members shifts and holidays.
• Participating in periodical meetings with line managers and PMs for scheduling tasks and work load modulation.
• Attending to meetings to improve the performance of daily tasks and analyzing past issues.
• Overtimes reduction and justifications.
• Field Engineering and Subco Teams Coordination.
• Responsible of controlling quality KPIs in stretch cooperation with RNO team.
• TTWOS and Remedy dispatching.
• Remote 3rd level support for Swapping Legacy Radio and Transport Network Elements into Huawei products.
• 3rd level Troubleshooting during and after swap.
profile_positions.title: RAN Integration Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
Tasks:
•	Weekly scheduling of jobs assigned to my team.
•	Planning of internal resources.
•	Interface with other departments to accuartely supply their demands.
•	Contact with Subcontractors in order to meet targets.
•	Matching the agreed SLAs with quality performance.
•	Analyse and fix cancellations and reschedules.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Achievements:
•	Huawei expert in my team.
•	2nd & 3rd carrier activation in 200 sites batches.
•	Special events deployments as fairs, congress, MotoGP, Vuelta Ciclista, festivals.
•	Generated different documentation such as courses and procedures.

Tasks:
•	RAN network deployment, as well as RAN Sharing, RAN Renewal and Single-RAN tasks.
•	Node B/RNC PS-CS re-parentings, Frequency re-farming and re-tunings.
•	BSC/RNC performance monitoring and troubleshooting. Statistical and signaling analysis. Mycom, Vitalsuite, Geoprobe, Arantech, K12.
•	Swap the legacy MW network into Ethernet BEP 2.0.
•	Deployed the ATM backbone network and swapped into MPLS technology
•	Optical fiber network deployment.
•	SAP control of Spares and PCBs stocks.
•	Technical procedures production and teaching internal trainings and courses.
profile_positions.title: Radio & Transmission Network Engineer (Permanent)

profile_positions.description:
Achievements
•	SDH expert on the team.
•	First steps of SDH fiber network deployment in my region.
•	Improved the SDH Company’s acceptance protocol.
•	Written and imparted several documentation and courses in different subject like SDH networking, Ericsson APG nodes, etc.

Tasks:
•	Deploy, commission and maintenance of Ericsson Core and RAN network: MSC/MSS/MG/HLR/SGSN/BSC/RNC with IOG & APG nodes. AXE, Cello and EVO platforms. 
•	B number analysis, signaling troubleshooting, performance testing.
•	Lead the new SDH network deployment.
•	Successfully deployed the Lucent ATM network.
profile_positions.title: Core Switching & Transmission Network Engineer (Permanent)

profile_positions.description:
Achievements
•	Deployed the Ericsson GSM network in my area, by certifying electrical and mechanical installations, commissioning and programming on site nodes, as well as troubleshooting. Ericsson RBS200, RBS2000, RBS3418, RBS6601 families. Ericsson BYB 202, BYB 501 exchanges. 
•	Drive Testing (TEMS tool)
•	Coordinated different field technician teams.
•	Written and imparted several documentation and courses.
profile_positions.title: Field Network Engineer (Permanent)

profile_positions.description:
Achievements
•	Improved the factory functional test line, based on GPIB, from 1 to 4 PCBs testing at once.
•	Reprograming the test line software in Labview, Labwindow & C++
•	Designed a battery charger for a new model of DECT phone.
profile_positions.title: Instrument and Factory Functional Test Engineer (Internship)
